title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories on the x axis representing Insurance Companies, and Profit in million U.S. dollars in each Insurance Companies on the y axis.
The highest category is found at State Farm Insurance Cos. where Profit in million U.S. dollars is 8788.4.
The lowest category is found at Farmers Insurance Exchange where Profit in million U.S. dollars is 70.5.
The highest value at State Farm Insurance Cos. is almost 124.66 times larger than the minimum value of Farmers Insurance Exchange.
The highest value at State Farm Insurance Cos. is almost 124.66 times larger than the minimum value of Farmers Insurance Exchange.
The difference between the max Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and min Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange is 8717.9.
